resources.string: In this type of questions, you will have to answer which number do you see, selecting one of the four given choices. Take a look at the images below for a better understanding.
In this type of questions, you will have to answers how many lines do you see, selecting one of the four given choices. Take a look at the images below for a better undestanding.
Don\'t worry, you don\'t suffer any type of color blindness.
Based on your answers it is possible that you may have red and green color blindness.
Based on your answers it is possible that you may have total color blindness.
